troubleshooting.title: Drag and Drop Without Initial Selection Does Not Work

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When I try to drag with the mouse an unselected file from the Project view or the DITA Maps Manager view, the drag doesn't start, it only selects the resource. I need to drag the resource again after it becomes selected. Therefore, any drag and drop action without an initial selection becomes a two step operation. How can I fix this?

steps-informal.p: This is a bug present in JVM versions prior to 1.5.0_09. This issue is fixed in 1.5.0_09 and newer versions. See the installation instructions for setting a specific JVM version for running the application.
